languages.text: "Твоим отравленным речам, ксенос, не сломить мои дух и веру. И лучше уж сгинуть в борьбе со злом, чем сдаться ему!" {n}Арджента стискивает челюсти, и вы замечаете искру сомнения, на секунду вспыхнувшую в ее глазах.{/n}

"Your poisonous words cannot break my spirit and my faith, xenos. I would rather die fighting evil than surrender!" {n}Argenta clenches her jaw and you notice the spark of doubt that flashes in her eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Твоим отравленным речам, ксенос, не сломить мои дух и веру. И лучше уж сгинуть в борьбе со злом, чем сдаться ему!" {n}Арджента стискивает челюсти, и вы замечаете искру сомнения, на секунду вспыхнувшую в ее глазах.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your poisoned words cannot break my spirit and my faith, xenos. I would rather die fighting evil than surrender!" {n}Argenta clenches her jaw, and you notice the spark of doubt that flashes in her eyes briefly.{/n}

"Your poisoned words cannot break my spirit and my faith, xenos. I would rather die fighting evil than surrender!" {n}Argenta clenches her jaw, and you notice the spark of doubt that flashes in her eyes briefly.{/n}

"Your toxic words cannot break my spirit and my faith, xenos. I would rather die fighting evil than surrender!" {n}Argenta clenches her jaw and you notice the spark of doubt that flashes in her eyes briefly.{/n}

"Your toxic words cannot break my spirit and my faith, xenos. I would rather die fighting evil than surrender!" {n}Argenta clenches her jaw and you notice the spark of doubt that flashes in her eyes briefly.{/n}

"Your poisonous words cannot break my spirit and my faith, xenos. I would rather die fighting evil than surrender!" {n}Argenta clenches her jaw and you notice the spark of doubt that flashes in her eyes.{/n}

"Your poisonous words cannot break my spirit and my faith, xenos. I would rather die fighting evil than surrender!" {n}Argenta clenches her jaw and you notice the spark of doubt that flashes in her eyes.{/n}

languages.text: 「お前の吐く言葉で、私の精神と信念が打ち砕かれることはない、異種族よ。降伏するくらいなら、悪と戦って死んだほうがましだ！」{n}アルジェンタは歯を食いしばる。彼女の瞳に疑念の閃光が走ったことに気づく。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your poisonous words cannot break my spirit and my faith, xenos. I would rather die fighting evil than surrender!" {n}Argenta clenches her jaw and you notice the spark of doubt that flashes in her eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お前の吐く言葉で、私の精神と信念が打ち砕かれることはない、異種族よ。降伏するくらいなら、悪と戦って死んだほうがましだ！」{n}アルジェンタは歯を食いしばる。彼女の瞳に疑念の閃光が走ったことに気づく。{/n}

languages.text: “你恶毒的话语无法摧毁我的信念与信仰，异形。我宁可与邪恶战斗到最后一刻，光荣战死，也决不投降！”{n}阿洁塔咬紧牙关，但你注意到她的目光中闪过了一丝怀疑的火花。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your poisonous words cannot break my spirit and my faith, xenos. I would rather die fighting evil than surrender!" {n}Argenta clenches her jaw and you notice the spark of doubt that flashes in her eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你恶毒的话语无法摧毁我的信念与信仰，异形。我宁可与邪恶战斗到最后一刻，光荣战死，也决不投降！”{n}阿洁塔咬紧牙关，但你注意到她的目光中闪过一丝怀疑的火花。{/n}

languages.text: «El veneno de tus palabras no puede quebrar mi espíritu ni mi fe, xenos. ¡Prefiero morir luchando contra el mal a rendirme!». {n}Argenta aprieta la mandíbula y notas una chispa de duda en sus ojos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your poisonous words cannot break my spirit and my faith, xenos. I would rather die fighting evil than surrender!" {n}Argenta clenches her jaw and you notice the spark of doubt that flashes in her eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «El veneno de tus palabras no puede quebrar mi espíritu ni mi fe, xenos. ¡Prefiero morir luchando contra el mal a rendirme!». {n}Argenta aprieta la mandíbula y notas una efímera chispa de duda en sus ojos.{/n}

languages.text: "Eure vergifteten Worte können meinen Geist und meinen Glauben nicht brechen, Xenos. Ich sterbe lieber im Kampf gegen das Böse, als mich zu ergeben!" {n}Argenta beißt die Zähne zusammen. Du bemerkst, dass in ihren Augen ein Hauch von Zweifel aufblitzt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your poisonous words cannot break my spirit and my faith, xenos. I would rather die fighting evil than surrender!" {n}Argenta clenches her jaw and you notice the spark of doubt that flashes in her eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eure toxischen Worte können meinen Geist und meinen Glauben nicht brechen, Xenos. Ich sterbe lieber im Kampf gegen das Böse, als mich zu ergeben!" {n}Argenta beißt die Zähne zusammen. Du bemerkst, dass in ihren Augen kurz Funke Zweifel aufflackert.{/n}

languages.text: « Vos paroles toxiques ne briseront ni mon esprit ni ma foi, xénos. Plutôt mourir en luttant contre le mal que de me rendre ! » {n}Argenta serre les dents. Dans ses yeux, il vous semble percevoir comme l'ombre d'un doute.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your poisonous words cannot break my spirit and my faith, xenos. I would rather die fighting evil than surrender!" {n}Argenta clenches her jaw and you notice the spark of doubt that flashes in her eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vos paroles empoisonnées ne briseront ni mon esprit ni ma foi, xénos. Plutôt mourir en luttant contre le mal que de me rendre ! » {n}Argenta serre les dents. Dans ses yeux, il vous semble percevoir comme l'ombre d'un doute.{/n}

languages.text: "Zehirli sözlerinle ruhumu ve inancımı yerle bir edemezsin zeno. Teslim olmaktansa şerle savaşırken ölmeyi yeğlerim!" {n}Argenta çenesini sıkıyor. Gözlerinde bir anlığına şüphe görüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your poisonous words cannot break my spirit and my faith, xenos. I would rather die fighting evil than surrender!" {n}Argenta clenches her jaw and you notice the spark of doubt that flashes in her eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Zehirli sözlerinle ruhumu ve inancımı yerle bir edemezsin zeno. Teslim olmaktansa şerle savaşırken ölmeyi yeğlerim!" {n}Argenta çenesini sıkıyor. Gözlerinde bir anlık bir şüphe görüyorsun.{/n}
